name: Global Photonics, Optics and Lasers Conference
content: It is a great pleasure for us to invite you all to participate as speaker, delegate, sponsor and/or as exhibitor at the Global Photonics, Optics and Lasers Conference(GPOLC2024), which will be held in Dubai, UAE during September 19-21, 2024\. The objective of GPOLC2024 is to provide a unique forum for discussion of the latest developments, refresh your knowledge and will offer plenty of networking opportunities, providing you a chance to meet and interact with leading researchers as well as most influential minds in the field of photonics and optics. This year we have adopted the theme "Exploring Interdisciplinary Science & Technological Shift on Photonics and Optics"
